posts.title: My first article
posts.markdown:
If you plan to publish content you may want to use the blog function out of your website. Here a some examples of what you can do. ### Formatting your content Markdown is a very simple formatting syntax for you content. Think about the looks these elements: headers, bold, bulleted lists, link, inserting a picture, etc. It was originally designed to be an easy alternative to HTML. It allows everyone to publish web pages with no HTML experience. ### Bold, italic Who does not love putting **stuff in bold**... *you know what I mean*? ### Links Want to link to a source? No problem. If you paste in a URL, like http://firepress.org/ ‚Äî it'll automatically be linked up. But if you want to customise your anchor text, you can do that too! Here's a link to go on [FirePress page](http://firepress.org/). ### What about Images? Images work too! Already know the URL of the image you want to include in your article? Simply paste it in like this to make it show up: ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/theme-assets/master/professionnal-services/martine-nadall/images/office-conference.jpg) ### Bullet points - Item number one - Item number two - sub item a - sub item b - A final item **Prefer using numbers?** 1. Remember to buy some milk 2. Drink the milk - sub item a - sub item b 3. Tweet that I remembered to buy the milk, and drank it ### Quoting Our eyes can't help it, they love reading quotes! > At FirePress our mission is to help brands and entrepreneurs to build an outstanding mobile-first website. --- ### Need some space? Throw 3 dashes `---` on any new line and you've got yourself a fancy new divider. Aw yeah. --- ### Button Need a clear **Call to Action**? The button is your friend. Click Me >
--- ### Working with code snippet Got a streak of geek? We've got you covered there, too. ``` ``` --- ### Embed a youTube video
posts.html:
If you plan to publish content you may want to use the blog function out of your website. Here a some examples of what you can do.

Formatting your content

Markdown is a very simple formatting syntax for you content. Think about the looks these elements: headers, bold, bulleted lists, link, inserting a picture, etc. It was originally designed to be an easy alternative to HTML. It allows everyone to publish web pages with no HTML experience.

Bold, italic

Who does not love putting stuff in bold... you know what I mean?

Links

Want to link to a source? No problem. If you paste in a URL, like http://firepress.org/ ‚Äî it'll automatically be linked up. But if you want to customise your anchor text, you can do that too! Here's a link to go on FirePress page.

What about Images?

Images work too! Already know the URL of the image you want to include in your article? Simply paste it in like this to make it show up:

Bullet points

  • Item number one
  • Item number two
    • sub item a
    • sub item b
  • A final item

Prefer using numbers?

  1. Remember to buy some milk
  2. Drink the milk
    • sub item a
    • sub item b
  3. Tweet that I remembered to buy the milk, and drank it

Quoting

Our eyes can't help it, they love reading quotes!

At FirePress our mission is to help brands and entrepreneurs to build an outstanding mobile-first website.

Need some space?

Throw 3 dashes --- on any new line and you've got yourself a fancy new divider. Aw yeah.

Button

Need a clear Call to Action? The button is your friend.

Click Me >

Working with code snippet

Got a streak of geek? We've got you covered there, too.

  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-XxXxXxXx-X', 'auto');
  ga('send', 'pageview');
</script>

posts.title: Services
posts.markdown:
### Help can we help? As a social media campaign ninja, we help businesses to focus their marketing efforts with dedication and passion. Our team is small, customer oriented and highly reactive. This simple placeholder is used for this live demo website. This showcase exists to help your mind projects how your website will look like. This block of content should help you. You can learn more [about us here](/u/genevieve-dubois/news/about-us/). **The core** of our operations are: - Content creation on FirePress - SEO optimisation - Social network planification - Banner et flyer infography - Video, TV, Radio - Print ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/theme-assets/master/professionnal-services/martine-nadall/images/production.jpg) --- ### Testimonials > I'm very impressed by what Sara did for my website. I couldn't have make it without you! xoxx
‚Äî [Katy Perry](https://twitter.com/katyperry?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) --- > What can I say that's not been said about Sara ? Bravissimo!
‚Äî Walt Mossberg from [theverge.com](http://www.theverge.com/users/WaltMossberg) --- > My life change since Sara is in my life.
‚Äî [Jeff Bezos](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jeffrey-bezos-b2b351123) --- > This platform *plus a shitload of work* is a game changer. Period!
‚Äî [Gary Vee](https://www.facebook.com/gary/) --- > Sara has nailed it with FirePress!
‚Äî Pascal Andy, blogger at [pascalandy.com](http://pascalandy.com/) ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firepress-org/themes-content/master/112_readiness/images/animated-good-job.gif) Portfolio >
posts.html:
Help can we help?

As a social media campaign ninja, we help businesses to focus their marketing efforts with dedication and passion. Our team is small, customer oriented and highly reactive.

This simple placeholder is used for this live demo website. This showcase exists to help your mind projects how your website will look like. This block of content should help you. You can learn more about us here.

The core of our operations are:

  • Content creation on FirePress
  • SEO optimisation
  • Social network planification
  • Banner et flyer infography
  • Video, TV, Radio
  • Print

Testimonials

I'm very impressed by what Sara did for my website. I couldn't have make it without you! xoxx
‚Äî Katy Perry

What can I say that's not been said about Sara ? Bravissimo!
‚Äî Walt Mossberg from theverge.com

My life change since Sara is in my life.
‚Äî Jeff Bezos

This platform plus a shitload of work is a game changer. Period!
‚Äî Gary Vee

Sara has nailed it with FirePress!
‚Äî Pascal Andy, blogger at pascalandy.com

Portfolio >
